testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Edge browser..............................................passed When User opens URL "https://demo.guru99.com/test/newtours/"................passed And User enters Username as "autotest1" and Password as "autotest1".........passed And Click on Submit.........................................................passed Then Page Title should be "Login: Mercury Tours"............................passed When User click on Signoff link.............................................passed Then Page Title should be "Welcome: Mercury Tours"..........................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
